abstract: Google plans to begin selling TV ads on the satellite programming channels distributed by EchoStar’s DISH Network.
snippet: Google plans to begin selling TV ads on the satellite programming channels distributed by EchoStar’s DISH Network.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, April 2 — Following its conquest of YouTube last year, Google is now aiming for a piece of the old-fashioned tube.

headline.main: Master of Search Seeks Mastery of the TV Dial
headline.print_headline: Master of Search Seeks Mastery of the TV Dial
